maker: Case maker Jacques Caffieri, Movement maker Julien Le Roy, Dial enamelled by Antoine-Nicolas Martinière
title: Wall Clock
description: Wall Clock; Case maker Jacques Caffieri (French, 1678 - 1755, master 1714), Movement maker Julien Le Roy (French, 1686 - 1759, master 1713), Dial enamelled by Antoine-Nicolas Martinière (French, 1706 - 1784, master 1720); Paris, France; about 1747; Gilt bronze and enamelled metal; 77.5 × 40.6 × 11.4 cm (30 1/2 × 16 × 4 1/2 in.); 72.DB.45; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
